alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Muscogee; Talbot; Troup; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Meriwether, northwestern Muscogee, west central Upson, southeastern Troup, northwestern Talbot and Harris Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1207 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Manchester to near F.d. Roosevelt State Park to near Lake Harding, and moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Talbotton, Manchester, West Point, Pine Mountain, Woodbury, Waverly Hall, Warm Springs, Woodland, Sunset Village, Goat Rock Lake, Ellerslie, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Green Island Hills, Cataula, Baughville, Flint Hill, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Mountain Hill and Big Lazer Creek Wma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Harris; Meriwether; Muscogee; Talbot; Troup; Upson
